thread.title: North Central Railway Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 413 Act Apprentice Posts
thread.title_full: North Central Railway Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 413 Act Apprentice Posts

author: publisher5
title: North Central Railway Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 413 Act Apprentice Posts
text: North Central Railway Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 413 Act Apprentice Posts North Central Railway Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 413 Act Apprentice Posts: Railway Recruitment Cell, North Central Railway, Allahabad has published a notification for the recruitment of 413 Act Apprentice vacancies under Apprentice Act, 1961 for the year 2016-17 in Wagon Repair, Jhansi and Rail Spring Karkhana Sithauli North Central Railway. Eligible candidates can apply online from 15-02-2017 to 17-03-2017. Other details like age limit, educational   process & how to apply are given below… North Central Railway Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 413 Name of Post: Act Apprentice Name of the Trade: i. Wagon Repair Workshop, Jhansi: 388 Posts 1. Fitter: 195 Posts 2. Welder (Gas & Electric): 102 Posts 3. Mechanic Machine & Tool Maintenance: 19 Posts 4. Machinist: 17 Posts 6. Crane Operator: 04 Posts 7. Electrician: 17 Posts 8. Programming & System Administration Assistant (COPA): 02 Posts ii. Rail Spring Karkhana Sithauli: 25 Posts 9. MMTM: 25 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age limit must have completed 15 years and should not have completed 24 years as on 01-01-2017. Age relaxation is applicable 05 years for SC/ ST, 03 years for OBC & 10 years for Physically Handicapped candidates.   Candidates should have passed 10th class examination or its equivalent (under 10+2 system) with minimum 50% marks and ITI passed certificate in related trade from a recognized Industrial Training Institute affiliated to NCVT. Selection Process: Selection will be based on merit & agreement of training. Application Fee: Candidates should have to pay of Rs. 100/- in favour of WAO, NCR, Jhansi and payable at Jhansi. The SC, ST, Physically Handicapped and Women candidates are relaxed from the application fee. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can apply online through website www.mponline.gov.in from 15-02-2017 to 17-03-2017 & send their hard copy of application, fee, all certificates of technical/ education/ cast certificate/ photo, identification card (aadhaar card) in original as well as one copy of all relevant documents attested by Gazetted Officer & should certainly write his name, fathers name & application registration number at left side on overleaf of the bank draft through ordinary/ registered/ speed post. Important Dates: Starting Date to Apply Online: 15-02-2017. Last Date to Apply Online: 17-03-2017. For more details like reservation, stipend & other information click on link given below…
